description:
Below modules have 755 as file mode bits

./compute/manager.py
./tests/virt/baremetal/test_tilera_pdu.py
./tests/virt/baremetal/test_tilera.py
./tests/virt/vmwareapi/test_configdrive.py
./tests/virt/vmwareapi/test_vmwareapi_vmops.py
./virt/baremetal/tilera.py
./virt/baremetal/driver.py
./virt/baremetal/tilera_pdu.py
./virt/xenapi/driver.py
./virt/driver.py
./virt/hyperv/driver.py
./virt/fake.py
./virt/libvirt/driver.py
./virt/libvirt/imagebackend.py
./virt/libvirt/utils.py
./virt/powervm/driver.py
./virt/images.py

They are not directly executed thus should be 644
title: Modules with wrong file mode bits

comments.content: so all three patches listed in this bug are merged, and nothing else is in the queue. So I think we're actually closed here. Please reopen if that's not the case.
